interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Watermark Beauty Super Star For Women, Eau de Parfum 2.7 Fl. Oz. / 80 ml - Inspired By Juicy Perfume
Review Date: 2016/06/21
Store: Watermark Beauty
Product Description: ["Super Star women's perfume by Watermark Beauty. Do you enjoy getting attention? Superstar will help you dazzle your company with a bold exquisite fragrance. Inspired by Hollywood Royal's Juicy Couture this strong perfume will put perfect finishing touches to your confident chic look. Thanks to the mix of quality ingredients it offers you a long-lasting pleasant odour which will keep you feeling good all day. (Note: When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you. For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied) If you are looking for something that can make you more seductive and appealing while having dinner with your loved one, this perfume is ideal and could do wonders for you. It smells amazing and would definitely enhance your personality. Designed to make for a great gift, birthdays anniversaries, graduation, holidays or just any day to day gift giving exchange. Made by Watermark Beauty. To ensure Great customers satisfaction this product Essential Oils was manufactured in the UK. Women's Eau De Toilette 2.7 Fl. Oz./80 Ml . Watermark Beauty is not associated with the maker of Juicy Couture. The product is inspired by Juicy Couture perfume. Packaging for this product may vary from that shown in the image above. Ingredients: Product contains Alcohol, Water, Fragrance, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil Essential Oils Made in UK"]
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Watermark Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Item Volume': '80 Milliliters', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.3 x 2.8 x 5 inches; 7.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '736902579862', 'Manufacturer': 'Watermark Beauty'}
Review Text: Wow. This Super Star For Women, Eau de Toilette by Watermark Beauty is strong. Not my favorite by far, but lasts well throughout the day. That being said when I spray myself it is so strong I have the need to want to wave away some of the scent it really invades your nostrils. The first whiff is overwhelming of alcohol, and needs some time to disperse to make it smell better. One spray should do just fine, so this 2.7 Fl. Oz. / 80 ml will last for a long time. The bottle is very cute, and the pink liquid in the clear glass makes it look very feminine. It even has a plastic top that looks like crystal, very cute. Inspired By Juicy Couture Perfume, but I cant imagine Juicy would smell like this.Overwhelmingly floral, its okay, but its more like something my grandmother would wear. I received this product at a discounted rate
Review Title: Not for me.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Delux Premium Blackhead & Blemish Remover Kit - Acne Treatment - 6 Professional Surgical Extractor Instruments - Extra Lancet - Cure Pimples, Blackheads, Comedones, Facial Impurities-Macs-2010 Mac Professional ["Macs Delux Blackhead & ; Blemish Remover Kit The #1 Dermatologist Approved Blackhead Remover Kit Stop Trying to Press or Pop them Yourself! You Won't Find a Better and Safer Solution for Perfect Skin Features:- - Ideal for Removal of all types of Blackheads, Cone domes and Facial Impurities - 6 Unique Remover Tools With in One kit that Dermatologists across the country use. - Easy to Use and Designed for Optimal Balance, Comfort and Performance for Your Skin! Will not cause irritation or redness. Everyone knows that when you try popping facial blemishes yourself it can be very painful and lead to ugly scars. That is the last thing anyone wants.Use The Tools in this Kit to Easily Clean Your Precious Skin. For Real Customer Service We believe our products are the absolute best we can offer to our customers. If for any reason at all, you are not fully satisfied with your essential Blackhead Kit, just simply return it for a full refund or exchange. Simple as that! Treat Your Skin the Way it Should Be with This Beauty Kit and Click ADD TO CART Above! **SPECIAL PROMOTIONAL OFFER** BUY NOW AND GET 60 DAYS REPLACEMENT WARRANTY !"] {'Brand': 'Mac Professional', 'Item Form': 'Needle', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Number of Items': '7', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 2.7 x 1.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MACS-2010', 'Manufacturer': 'Macs Products'} Its one of the grossest things in the world, blackheads. But lets face it, some of us women are so fascinated by them! We love to pop and pull and squeeze and get all the gunk out of not only our faces, but our spouses. Eeeewww. Until not long ago I did not realize how much popping pimples is so bad for your skin! Leaves holes and scarring and no wonder I have such big pores... So after learning that I was so excited to try out this Deluxe Premium Blackhead & Blemish Remover Kit by Mac Professional. This set comes with so many different tools its hard to know where to start. There is one tool in particular that is the coolest, though a bit dangerous. It has two heads that screw into each side for safety and can be removed and screwed on the sides, and has a lancet and another head. Its extremely sharp and you must be careful with it, this is a "professional" set so I really don't use more than the ones just to remove blackheads, very nice set, and I love that it comes with a case that has inserts to safely store every piece. I received this product at a discounted rate

Thanks <3 Be careful with these tools if you dont know how to use them. Watermark Beauty Lady Passion Perfume 3.3 Fl Oz Inspired by Designer Brand Perfume Watermark Beauty ['Sexy but casual, lady passion boasts classy notes like apple, freesia, peach, mimosa, jasmine, combined with some woody tones to bring a perfume that will become every Ladys Passion. At Watermark Beauty we are constantly creating and manufacturing unique and exquisite perfumes, colognes and scents. Inspired by your favorite brand names, we learn from the experts how to make the scents that you love to smell around you, on you and in you. We exclusively produce fragrances and cremes with scents that will linger around during the day and keep your skin feeling soft and luscious at night. To ensure great quality products and satisfaction from our customers we pride ourselves in manufacturing all Essential Oils in the U.K.'] {'Brand': 'Watermark Beauty', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Item Weight': '0.57 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 6.5 inches; 9.12 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SC1010', 'UPC': '713807392871'} This Lady Passion For Women, Eau De Parfum is supposed to be inspired By Paris Hilton perfume, however i do not have that perfume so I really can not describe the difference. However, I can tell you that this Lady Passion perfume smells nice. It has a very distinct citrus smell, almost grapefruity type smell. Its nice on the nose but not really my favorite kind of scent when I want to wear a perfume. It comes in a very large 3.3 Fl. Oz./100 ml glass bottle that should last you a while, however I did notice that the scent dissipated quite dramatically from me as the day went on and if I wanted to keep the good smell to be continuously noticeable I would have to reapply, but its price is very affordable. It comes with an easy push squirt application nozzle. I received this product at a discounted rate

Thanks <3 Fruity Diva Scent For Women, Eau De Parfum 2.8 Fl. Oz. / 80 ml - Inspired By Juicy Perfume Watermark Beauty ["Diva Scent Perfume by Watermark Beauty Want to feel special tonight? You can give your look an extra spark with this splendid perfume. This quality mix of perfume, demineralized water and essential oils is a must have for the party. (Note: When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you. For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied) If you are looking for something that can make you more seductive and appealing while having dinner with your loved one, this perfume is ideal and could do wonders for you. It smells amazing and would definitely enhance your personality. Designed to make for a great gift, birthdays anniversaries, graduation, holidays or just any day to day gift giving exchange. Made by Watermark Beauty. To ensure Great customers satisfaction this product Essential Oil was manufactured in the UK. Women's Eau De Parfum 2.8 Fl. Oz. / 80 ml. Packaging for this product may vary from that shown in the image above. Ingredients: Product contains 80% alcohol grade: 40-B, parfum, aqua (demineralized water) Made in India"] {'Brand': 'Watermark Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.2 x 2.5 x 4.7 inches; 9 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SC1006', 'UPC': '794168355774 736902579855', 'Manufacturer': 'Watermark Beauty'} At first I did not know if I really liked this Diva Scent For Women, Eau De Parfum, but after a few days of wear it is really starting to grow on me. It is supposed to be inspired by Juicy, however I have not ever tried Juicy before so I cant tell you how close it is unfortunately. I can tell you, however, that it smells very fruity with a milk floral scent. Very sweet and refreshing and very hip for the younger women. Almost like a fruity dryer sheet, but in a good way. It comes in a rectangular clear bottle and the perfume itself is pink and very girly, it even has a pink bow around the spray nozzle. I think this 2.8 Fl. Oz. / 80 ml bottle should last quite a while, and after 3 good sprays in the morning I cold still smell it on my shirt at the end of the night. The only thing I did not like was that the golden cap was on so tight that I actually pulled off the bottom piece when trying to get the lid off, other than that I really like this perfume. I received this product at a discounted rate

Thanks <3 Very nice scent. Watermark Beauty Super Star For Women, Eau de Parfum 2.7 Fl. Oz. / 80 ml - Inspired By Juicy Perfume Watermark Beauty ["Super Star women's perfume by Watermark Beauty. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: The user remains strongly focused on skincare, especially in treating blackheads and facial blemishes. Their interest in fragrances has deepened, particularly towards fruity, sweet, and refreshing scents that resonate with modern appeal.

- **Preferences**: Prefers high-quality, multifunctional skincare kits and beauty tools for effective treatment. They are enthusiastic about affordable perfumes that are enjoyable to wear and easy to reapply throughout the day. Recently, their fragrance exploration includes scents that balance sweetness and freshness, with particular attention to scent longevity, though they have experienced varying results.

- **Behavior Patterns**: Engages in comprehensive product analysis, valuing detailed reviews and information about both skincare and fragrances prior to purchasing. Their cautious approach in both areas highlights a commitment to effective results while prioritizing safety and care. Their latest interaction indicates a preference for fragrances that last long but may possess overpowering qualities, leading to mixed experiences.

- **Attitude Towards Scents**: The user continues to explore unique and youthful scents while reflecting on how personal body chemistry affects fragrance longevity and profile. Their recent experiences show curiosity paired with a discerning taste, with an openness to trying new options despite some disappointing outcomes.

Overall, the user is focused on achieving clear skin while diversifying their fragrance collection, indicating a keen eye for quality and a thoughtful approach to personal care, even amidst occasional challenges with certain fragrance choices.
